title: Emperor Has Returned - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Mature   Shounen
tags: Arrogant Characters   Betrayal   Cruel Characters   Dark   Demi-Humans   Depictions of Cruelty   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Lack of Common Sense   Male Protagonist   Previous Life Talent   Religions   Resurrection   Sword And Magic   Tragic Past
author: Corgi Bear   코기베어
description:
Humanity’s savior. Vanquisher of gods.

Empire’s first emperor, Juan Kalberk Kenosis.

Ahead of his final battle, he is betrayed.

The emperor's eyes close as he meets his end…… so he should have.

“Which bastard brought me back to life-eee!!“

After dying and resurrecting, he looks behind the black curtain for the hidden truth. And to stop the rift that’s dividing the world, in the name of heresy he begins his fight against the empire.

The emperor has now returned!>
